name: EsKeypee
description:
Description

EsKeypee is a game where you as a player need to find all the keys to escape from the current stage. This is a platformer game where you need to be careful of the obstacles and some items may not be functioned as what it seems.

Control

Movement using arrow key to move the character.

CSUI Individual Game Jam 2020

Part of submission for GameJam CSUI 2020

  • Night of Fire

This diversifier implement a time limit inside of the game. EsKeypee forced the player to find all the keys in certain amount of time that's been given to escape. Should the player takes too long to find the keys, they will lose life points.

  • Mata Batin

This diversifier implement a mechanic where player can see hidden object when they stand/touch something, and also they can see a fake object where the object is actually not there.

  • Is it wrong to pick up a treasure in a dungeon?

This diversifier implement an object where should the player pickup the object they will get punished instead of getting the usual reward.

Texture

Main character texture : https://luizmelo.itch.io/medieval-warrior-pack-2?download
